description:
Takeshita Yuumi is the newest recruit in Tawagoto Police Department. Eight years ago she was saved from a traffic accident by a stranger. She became a police officer not only to help others, but also to find this man. Her prince as she started to call him in her dreams.
Yuumi, may be a daydreamer, but she is also a pro wrestler, which really helps in daily police tasks.
name: Takeshita Yuumi
